short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integrate Ringover's dialer into Odoo for calling, contact management, and support ticket creation directly in the same interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your communication experience with the Ringover VoIP Phone for Odoo!
Seamlessly click on any phone number in Odoo to make a call, receive incoming calls, and sync contacts all directly within the platform.

Key features:

Click2Dial: Simply click any phone number in Odoo, and your call is instantly launched from your Ringover dialer. No more copy-pasting numbers!

Inbound Calls: Receive calls directly in Odoo and immediately identify your caller for quicker responses.

Call History: Stay on top of your communications with a detailed call history on each contact’s page, including call recordings and transcripts for a clear, organized overview.

Contact Synchronization: Sync your Odoo contacts with Ringover. Choose between syncing all contacts, storing them on a per-call basis, or keeping no contacts stored.

Qualify Your Interactions: Easily add notes and personalized tags to your calls, directly from the dialer within Odoo.

How to get started:

Sign In / Sign up to Ringover: Enhance your calling experience, by either log in to your Ringover account or, if you're new, sign up for a 7-day free trial with no commitment directly from the extension’s option menu.
Boost your productivity and communication efficiency with the Ringover VoIP Phone for Odoo today!
